Name: Oceans 21
Ingredients: 30 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
15 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS flamed orange zest twist over cocktail, then use as garnish.
Review: Apple, cranberry and orange harmoniously presented.
Nutrition: One serving of Oceans 21 contains 134 calories
